
\beginhymn Laudemus Virginem.


%\sidx{Let us praise the Virgin}

\moveright10mm\vtop{

\hsize80mm

\resetlayout

\def\Notes{\vnotes4}
\def\NOtes{\vnotes5}
\def\NOTes{\vnotes6}

%\rmlyrics

\def\lyra#1{\cchar{-6}{\rm #1}}
\def\engl#1{\cchar{-12}{\it #1}}
\def\lyrb#1{\cchar{-19}{\rm #1}}
\def\engb#1{\cchar{-25}{\it #1}}
\def\lyrc#1{\cchar{-32}{\rm #1}}
\def\engc#1{\cchar{-38}{\it #1}}
\def\lyrd#1{\cchar{-45}{\rm #1}}
\def\engd#1{\cchar{-51}{\it #1}}

\generalmeter\meterC
%\belowsystem{6}
\smallmusicsize
\setclef1{\treble}
\startpiece
%\Notes\lyra{1.}\en
\Notes\lyra{\llap{1.~}Lau-}\lyrb{et}\lyrc{\llap{2.~}Plan-}\lyrd{spe-}\rchar{10}{I}\qa{f}\en
\Notes\lyra{de-}\lyrb{e-}\lyrc{ge-}\lyrd{ran-}\engl{}\qa{e}\en
\NOtes\lyra{mus}\lyrb{jus}\lyrc{mus}\lyrd{tes}\ha{d}\en
\bar
\Notes\lyra{Vir-}\lyrb{Fi-}\lyrc{sce-}\lyrd{in}\rchar{10}{II}\qa{f}\en
\Notes\lyra{gi-}\engl{Let us praise the Virgin, for she is a Mother;}%
\lyrb{li-}\engb{and her Son is Jesus.}%
\lyrc{le-}\engc{Let us bitterly lament our sins;}%
\lyrd{Je-}\engd{hoping in Jesus perpetually.}\qa{g}\en
\NOtes\lyra{nem,}\lyrb{us}\lyrc{ra}\lyrd{sum}\ha{'a}\en
\bar
\Notes\lyra{Ma-}\lyrb{Je-}\lyrc{a-}\lyrd{ju-}\rchar{10}{III}\qa{'c}\en
